com.tokelon.toktales.core.render.opengl

Interface IGLFlags


  • public interface IGLFlags

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getGLFlagsForValue(int value, int[] results)
      Looks for glFlags for which with internal value matches the given value, and stores them in results.
      int getGLFlagValue(int glFlag)
      Returns the internal value for the given glFlag.
      boolean isGLFlag(int value, int glFlag)
      Compares the given value with the internal value of glFlag.
      boolean isInGLFlags(int value, int... glFlags)
      Compares the given value with the internal values of all given glFlags.

    • Method Detail

      • isGLFlag

        boolean isGLFlag(int value,
                 int glFlag)
        Compares the given value with the internal value of glFlag.

        If there is flag for glFlag it compares the given value with the given glFlag.

        Parameters:
        value -
        glFlag -
        Returns:
        True if the given value matches the internal glFlag value, false if not.

      • isInGLFlags

        boolean isInGLFlags(int value,
                    int... glFlags)
        Compares the given value with the internal values of all given glFlags.
        Parameters:
        value -
        glFlags -
        Returns:
        True if the given value matches one of the internal glFlag values, false if not.

      • getGLFlagValue

        int getGLFlagValue(int glFlag)
        Returns the internal value for the given glFlag.
        Parameters:
        glFlag -
        Returns:
        The value for glFlag, or if there is no such flag, glFlag itself.

      • getGLFlagsForValue

        int getGLFlagsForValue(int value,
                       int[] results)
        Looks for glFlags for which with internal value matches the given value, and stores them in results.

        If there is not enough space in results, only the first results.length results will be stored.

        Parameters:
        value -
        results -
        Returns:
        The number of matching glFlags found.
